summary: Saanufox Netflix-style video streaming platform with video upload, playback, user authentication, and PWA support
architectural_notes: Internet Computer (ICP) deployment with frontend and backend canisters
Internet Identity authentication for user login
PWA (Progressive Web App) support for mobile installation
Netflix-style dark theme UI with horizontal scrolling rows
Video upload supports both YouTube links and file uploads
All authenticated users have upload permissions (admin-only restriction removed)
Video playback with streaming and download capabilities
Categories, search, and browse functionality for video discovery
known_issues: Canister ID Not Resolved error occurring after deployment - requires fresh rebuild with proper backend initialization

existing_features.title: Perform a complete fresh rebuild of the entire Saanufox video streaming platform with new canister IDs to resolve the persistent 'Canister ID Not Resolved' error that occurs after deployment

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure proper backend canister initialization with correct actor configuration and routing setup to prevent gateway resolution failures
Verify all existing video streaming features work correctly after fresh rebuild including video CRUD operations, blob storage, access control, user profiles, favorites, watchlist, and admin analytics
